function getListing(uint256 tokenId) view returns (address seller, uint256 price, bool active)
function getAuction(uint256 tokenId) view returns (address seller, uint256 startingPrice, uint256 highestBid, address highestBidder, uint256 endTime, bool active, bool settled)
function isListed(uint256 tokenId) view returns (bool)
function isInAuction(uint256 tokenId) view returns (bool)
function getTokenStatus(uint256 tokenId) view returns (uint8 status, uint256 price, address seller, uint256 endTime)
function pendingReturns(address) view returns (uint256)
function listItem(uint256 tokenId, uint256 price) external
function cancelListing(uint256 tokenId) external
function updateListing(uint256 tokenId, uint256 newPrice) external
function buyItem(uint256 tokenId) external payable
function createAuction(uint256 tokenId, uint256 startingPrice, uint256 duration) external
function placeBid(uint256 tokenId) external payable
function endAuction(uint256 tokenId) external
function cancelAuction(uint256 tokenId) external
function withdraw() external
function getPendingReturns(address user) view returns (uint256)
event ItemListed(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed seller, uint256 price)
event ListingCancelled(uint256 indexed tokenId)
event ListingUpdated(uint256 indexed tokenId, uint256 newPrice)
event ItemSold(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed seller, address indexed buyer, uint256 price)
event AuctionCreated(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed seller, uint256 startingPrice, uint256 endTime)
event BidPlaced(uint256 indexed tokenId, address indexed bidder, uint256 amount)
event AuctionEnded(uint256 indexed tokenId, address winner, uint256 amount)
event AuctionCancelled(uint256 indexed tokenId)
